name: Exodus: Journey to the Promised Land
overview: Help Moses solve the puzzle with 10 fascinating action-packed levels featuring mazes and other obstacles to faith. With your staff and the spoken word of God, you will defend against enemies including magicians, taskmasters, Pharoh's soldiers, weaknesses of man, hardened hearts, and other devices that challenge the character of God. Along the way, Moses can gather Holy oil, the armor of God, greater faith, and much more.
